content:
President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky has a telephone conversation with the President of Indonesia Prabovo Subianto.

About this hewroteIn his telegram channel.

In particular, Volodymyr Zelenskyy congratulated him on his victory in the elections and expressed hope for the continuation of mutually beneficial bilateral relations.

"In 2022, I presented the Peace Formula — the real path to a just peace — in Indonesia. Now we are preparing the inaugural peace summit, and Indonesia's participation in it is fundamentally important for us," the Ukrainian head of state stressed.

In addition, the President of Ukraine invited Prabovo Subianto to join the summit and implementation of food and nuclear safety points, as well as the exchange of prisoners.

We will remind, Volodymyr ZelenskyyHe notedcombat units that have performed best on the battlefield.

As reported by the Armyinform, President of Ukraine Volodymyr ZelenskyyHe stressedthat every significant strengthening of our air defense means thousands of saved human lives.
title: President of Ukraine invited his Indonesian counterpart to join the Peace Summit
description: He wrote about it in his telegram channel. In particular, Volodymyr Zelenskyy congratulated him ...
author: Army Inform
